description_text:
Hi,

I have these Simmson pedals I ordered off Amazon back in March of last
year. They were the older model with the older control box.


They use the original control box and only calibrate with the original
software and freejoy

Is there a way to upgrade this or do I need a new control box to use the
new software
.


Also if I bought a new control box so I could use your haptics. Would it be
compatible

conversations.body_text:
Also, great pedals. I have 3 of my friends on them and recommend them to
everyone in our race league every chance I get!!

Hi Nathan Brown,  For the Pro Plus, you can update directly by going to the update interface → Manual Firmware Update → navigate to the "pedals-firmware" folder → then the "pedals" folder → and select the "plus.sfu" file.       https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

[image: image.png]

On the V4, it says to use 3.5. I'm on a FW 1.7 apparently.

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025 at 1:56 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Nathan Brown,  Your control box version is too old to support the latest SIMSONN Manager. We recommend upgrading to the latest PlusX control box, which also supports vibration feedback motors. There is also an upgrade kit available for the pedals to further enhance your overall experience.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498     https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit

That's what I figured. I just purchased a control box off Amazon today.
Along with haptics. I already have bsts thru SimHub but I'm excited about
your haptics and seeing how well that works.

 You guys do amazing work. I can't believe how much you have grown since I
bought your pedals back in March of 2024. Can't wait to buy a wheelbase.

You guys also already sent me that similar upgrade kit free of charge last
year.


Appreciate the quick response and confirming what I kind of figured.

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025, 11:58 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Nathan Brown,  Thank you so much for your kind words and support! At SIMSONN, we've made it our mission to create high-performance, cost-effective products for sim racing enthusiasts. With your support, we’re able to grow, improve, and continue pursuing excellence.
